description: A host of the "FinTech Future" podcast asks the PodMatch AI to find a recently funded fintech startup founder to appear on an episode about emerging payment technologies. The AI fetches podcast metadata, analyzes audience interests, searches expert profiles, ranks candidates, and generates a personalized invitation email.

messages.content: You are PodMatch, an AI assistant that helps podcast hosts find ideal guests. Use the provided tools to gather podcast topics, analyse audience data, search for experts, rank them, and craft personalized outreach emails.

I host the "FinTech Future" podcast. I want to feature a fintech startup founder who recently raised a Series A round on my next episode about emerging payment technologies. Here is my RSS feed: https://example.com/fintech-future/rss.xml

My audience analytics (CSV) are:
```
user_id,listen_time_minutes,topic_interest
1,45,real-time payments
2,30,digital wallets
3,60,blockchain payments
4,20,open banking
5,50,cryptocurrency
6,35,real-time payments
7,40,digital wallets
8,55,open banking
9,25,blockchain payments
10,45,real-time payments
```
Let me gather the podcast's past episode data to understand the topics you usually cover.
Now I’ll extract the most common audience interests from the analytics you provided.

arguments.analytics_data:
user_id,listen_time_minutes,topic_interest
1,45,real-time payments
2,30,digital wallets
3,60,blockchain payments
4,20,open banking
5,50,cryptocurrency
6,35,real-time payments
7,40,digital wallets
8,55,open banking
9,25,blockchain payments
10,45,real-time payments

messages.content: Great. Based on your episode topics and audience interests, I’ll look for fintech startup founders who have recently raised a Series A and specialize in payment technologies.
I’ll now rank these candidates against your podcast’s past topics and audience interests.

candidates.name: Lena Kovacs
candidates.bio: Co‑founder & CEO of PayPulse, a real‑time payments platform that closed a $12M Series A in March 2024.

candidates.name: Ravi Mehta
candidates.bio: Founder of ClearPay, focused on API‑driven digital wallet solutions; raised $8M Series A in January 2024.

candidates.name: Sofia Alvarez
candidates.bio: CEO of BlockTransfer, a blockchain‑based cross‑border payment startup; secured $15M Series A in February 2024.

messages.content: Lena Kovacs looks like the best fit. I’ll draft a personalized invitation for her.

arguments.guest_bio: Co‑founder & CEO of PayPulse, a real‑time payments platform that closed a $12M Series A in March 2024.

messages.content:
Subject: Invitation to Join "FinTech Future" – Episode on Real‑Time Payments

Hi Lena,

I’m Alex Rivera, host of the "FinTech Future" podcast where we dive deep into the innovations reshaping the financial industry. Our listeners — many of whom are passionate about real‑time payments, digital wallets, and open banking — would love to hear about the journey behind PayPulse.

Given your recent $12M Series A round and the groundbreaking work you’re doing to make instant transactions a reality, I think you’d be a perfect guest for our upcoming episode titled "The Future of Real‑Time Payments." We’d love to discuss:

1. What inspired the creation of PayPulse?
2. The challenges and breakthroughs in building a real‑time payments infrastructure.
3. Your vision for the next wave of payment innovation.

The interview typically runs 30‑45 minutes and can be scheduled at your convenience via our simple Calendly link (https://calendly.com/fintechfuture/alex). Of course, we’re happy to accommodate any format you prefer.

Thank you for considering this invitation. I’m excited about the possibility of sharing your story with our community.

Best regards,
Alex Rivera
Host, FinTech Future Podcast
alex@fintechfuture.com
Twitter: @FinTechFuturePod
Here is the draft email you can send to Lena Kovacs. Let me know if you’d like any tweaks or if you’d like me to schedule a meeting on your behalf.
